column4: 10.10 doesn't work. PM me please I've been trying for 8 hours!
nobody will PM.. questions and answers should be in channel for all to learn.. you need to ask more specific questions to get specific answers..
look toward the end of the line produced by uname -a .. you should see x86_64
open a terminal and type ...   uname -a
go to the k launcher > Applications> System > Konsole .. when konsole opens type uname -a
K Menu > Computer > KPackageKit > Settings > Edit Software Sources > Updates (look at the bottom of that window and change teh "Long term support releases only" to "Normal Releases" ..
I don't see Long term support releases only under Updates.
at the bottom of the window
i don't see anything like that. what title should that be under? I see Kubuntu updates and Automatic updates
I don't know where you're at in the menu.. but in KPackageKit you click the "Settings" option on the left .. get in there and you should see it.
i used settings > Edit Software Sources > Updates
I don't see that at all.
Oh.. well... you're either in the wrong spot or you have a version of kubuntu that's pretty old.  I can't see it for you.
